Text: Livelink Cc are working in Livelink and you notice that it is not working properly or not working at all please let me or Mark know as soon as possible We are then responsible for alerting other users not in our group and also contacting someone in IT If you happen to be the person that becomes aware of this problem please make a point to come and tell me or Mark at that time Thank you Brenna
Time Tracking formlets try this again I left out the Time Spent Tracking Sorry Delet the one I just sent you and use this one Brenna

FW Bumping into the husbandForwarded by Brenna NevesNAEnron on PM Michael CT AM To Brenna NRON cc Subject FW Bumping into the husband Forwarded by Michael NevesHOUECT on AM From James nronXgate on AM To Michael CT cc Subject FW Bumping into the husband fyi hyundaimpeg

Time Management Reportemailed me the current Time Tracking sheet that you all are using I have revised it to include spaces for numbers of each type of commodity that you track This way rather than estimating numbers of different commodities tracked each week we can get true numbers for Carolyn each month Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Brenna

Pager numberscase you all dont already have this Pete gave me the rotating pager number for his group Hopefully this will enable us to get in contact with someone on a weekend if the need arises I would only use this number on the weekends as we SHOULD be able to contact someone during the week Thanks Brenna

FW The Far Side of the ElectionForwarded by Brenna NevesNAEnron on PM Michael CT PM To Brenna NRON Scott CT cc Subject FW The Far Side of the Election Forwarded by Michael NevesHOUECT on PM John Shea on AM To Blaine E Eaton Donny Gary W Donelson Jeff Wells Leverson M Neves Nathan Kurtin Rob Drogotta Sam Whit Sam uminant Com Anderson AllanX Bryan Sellers Byran OMFORTSYSTEMSUSACOM Doug Flatt John Funk JOSE CASAS kelly deGraffenried Patrick Paul Smith Ron Krc Scam Scott Stout Rob unocom Todd Clark Trent Sultemeier cc Subject FW The Far Side of the Election Original Message From crewdog SMTP Sent Friday December AM To Subject The Far Side of the Election Farsidejpg Farsidejpg

Meeting regarding correctionswe will postpone the meeting for today I do not have the list ready for Joe and we are all so busy I feel it would be better to do the meeting again after the first of the year Thanks Brenna

Re REQUEST FOR TIME OFFdays off are fine See if you can get the calendar and put your days on it I know that sounds backwards since you could have done it before but this way we can all get into the habit of emailing getting a response and then putting it on the calendar Sorry for the confusion Brenna Judy CT PM To Brenna NRON cc Mark D CT Subject REQUEST FOR TIME OFF I AM REQUESTING FOR THIS TIME OFF DECTH DECST DECND MY FAMILY AND I ARE PLANNING A TRIP TO HUNTSVILLE

Re Voice mail regarding decimals written on confirmationsForwarded by Brenna NevesNAEnron on PM Enron North America Corp From Larry Joe Hunter ECT PM To Brenna NRON cc Eve NRON Judy CT Subject Re Voice mail regarding decimals written on confirmations Brenna For Confirms in which a Counterparty writes a decimal number next to our Option Premium Dollar Amount consider these Confirms ok to Execute unless the Premium is crossed out and a new dollar amount is noted Thanks Joe Brenna NRON PM To Larry Joe CT cc Subject Voice mail regarding decimals written on confirmations Hi Joe Would you mind emailing your message to me regarding the numbers written in on the confirmations I head the voice mail that you left for Eve and I would like to try to keep written documentation of these things as well Just something short would be fine whenever you have a chance Thanks for your help Joe Brenna

Returned MDealsto recap in writing When you are tracking faxed MDeals if you come across those that are not in Tagg or are in Tagg with an incorrect status keep track of these numbers email them to me and send the physical copy back to Laurel not to Melissa Please email these to me each day and I will email them to Laurel and Carolyn Thanks for your help Brenna

IPTV viewer and downloading music from the Internethave recently learned that using the IPTV viewer and downloading music from the internet can possibly interfere with other applications that you may be working in Please do not use IPTV viewer or download music from your PC while at work If you have any questions please let me know Thanks Brenna

Faxing Mdeals and LiquidsI am trying to get an accurate number of the volume that we are faxing each day If each of you will email to me the total number of liquids and the total number of mdeals that you fax each day I will be able to keep a running total Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Brenna

Re Executed Confirmations not tracked in Enpower Cc Thank you for bringing this to our attention In researching these documents we have identified several issues that have now been and will continue to be addressed I apologize for the inconvenience that this has caused and we will be revising procedures to ensure that this does not happen in the future Below describes the situation leading to each document not being executed as it should have been These documents were identified as needing review by power When a document is identified as needing review it is placed in a designated spot These documents are to be reviewed weekly by us to determine if we are to file or execute the document These documents were not reviewed in a timely manner resulting in never being tracked This deal number was incorrectly tracked on wrong deal typed into Tagg This error was discovered on and the status was changed back to sent to counterparty after the real had come through which changed a correct status of executed for the document to an incorrect status of sent to counterparty This deal number was incorrectly tracked on wrong deal typed into Tagg This error was discovered on and the status was changed back to sent to counterparty after the real had come through which changed a correct status of executed for the document to an incorrect status of sent to counterparty Deal numbers typed into Tagg but when highlighting all documents to change status to Executed these deals were not highlighted to update status Therefore these documents were not updated This document is still being researched In an effort to correct these issues we will be modifying our current procedure of reviewing the power revised documents weekly as well as addressing the importance of focusing directly on the task at hand Those of us working directly with confirmations will be meeting tomorrow to discuss these issues and the several procedural changes that will be taking place Again I am sorry for the inconvenience and we will be working to ensure that this does not happen in the future If you have questions regarding these explanations please feel free to call me and I will explain further Thank you Brenna Stephanie Piwetz ECT PM To Brenna NRON Leslie CT Carolyn CT cc Kim S CT Subject Executed Confirmations not tracked in Enpower Hello all In the process of sending Confirmation Follow Up Reports I have found executed Confirmation Letters in Livelink that were not tracked Executed in Enpower Counterparty DTE Energy Deal Numbers Counterparty Duke Energy Deal Numbers I have tracked all above executed Thank you in advance for looking into this matter Please let me know what I can do to help Stephanie x

chicken headForwarded by Brenna NevesNAEnron on PM on PM To cc Subject chicken head I dont know about you guys but Im in the mood for fried chicken heads Forwarded by Sam NevesLuminant on PM Lona Kavanagh PM To Sam uminant cc Subject chicken head heard about this anye sent it to me its hilarious looking be sure to watch the news clip at the bottom wpdynarticlesANovhtml Lona Kavanagh fax Luminant Worldwide

Logging documents sent to JoeIf you are not currently logging all documents sent to Joe please begin doing so again I know the volume being sent downstairs is enormous but we need to do this to cover ourselves I dont think we have been for about a month but please start this again tomorrow Thanks Brenna

BatchesIf you are doing batches please send all correspondence concerning problems etc to Pete and also to Paul Jerome I apologize for not making everyone aware of this change Let me know if you have any questions or concerns Thanks Brenna
Gas deals that do not involve Enronyou see Gas Deals that are between two parties other than Enron throw them away Joe has said that we do not need to call them to let them know just toss them Brenna

digit weather dealsweather deals that you see that have WS and then a twodigit number need to be sent back to have our number written on them They should be returned to Celeste Cisneros I am not sure where she is located but if you happen to find any of these just ask and whoever does the run will make sure they go to the proper location Thank you Brenna

Gas Deals with Enterprise Products Operating LP as Counterpartyuntil Joe tells me otherwise he needs to see all deals done with the Counterparty Enterprise Products Operating LP if the counterparty signature has a stamp above it that says By Enterprise Products GP LLC General Partner I will send around a copy tomorrow so that you can see an example of what I am talking about I still do not have the list typed up from our meeting but I will get the information to you as soon as I can Thanks Brenna
